content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for showing interest in my apartment, Nesibe. I understand that you are looking for a place to rent for a reasonable price. Can you please tell me what your budget is for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
250-300 Euros per month.

And what is the monthly rental price?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Based on your budget, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually agreeable rental price. Can you please provide me with your preferred monthly rental price within the range of 250-300 Euros?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
275 Euros per month.

I agree to the price of 275 Euros per month.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Nesibe. I accept your proposed rental price of 275 Euros per month. You will be responsible for paying the rent on time each month, and I will provide you with a lease agreement that outlines the terms and conditions of the rental agreement. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before signing the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
